buy
游戏确实是好游戏，挂哥、速修和防救也确实是搞心态，断断续续玩了800小时，还是推荐一波吧，希望zzz解决解决现有的问题，让我们有更好的体验

这游戏本身有很多可圈可点的地方不假，但是就像“不推荐”的字面意思一样，我目前不会把这个游戏推荐给我的朋友。

因为作为一个五周年都过了快小半年的网络游戏，每次更新都离谱，下载一个几十兆的补丁，然后修补动辄几十G，再验证几十G？还会有可能报错什么的，折腾半天，真的很让人升血压，我真的会忍不住怀疑你们制作方是不是有什么大病？另外，都2021、快到2022年了，作为一个网游，5周年都过了的网游，这游戏还会有丢档的情况，而且所谓的补偿还是那种找不回直接记录、只能靠游戏时长给你补偿点血点的补偿方式，我是真觉得挺厉害的。
至于其他很多人吐槽的外挂之类的问题，我可能还算幸运，在日服鱼塘玩，见得少，血压没那么高，就不多吐槽了，你们好自为之。

当然，也可能你们的想法，真的就是“I think we did a pretty good job so far”，之前投票还想让老玩家们帮你们投“爱的奉献”？你们是真觉得市面上没别的游戏了还是真觉得自己干得挺漂亮的？你们什么时候把更新操作离谱和还会丢档的问题彻底解决，没那么多离谱bug了，我再考虑改好评的问题。
哈哈哈真好玩哈哈哈哈哈

game is bs if you arent enjoying the experience and leave the game you get punished with 5-15 min timer so i would not recommend spending actual money where they can ban you on a timer for not enjoying the way your game is going like bad teammates or a toxic killer. if he wants to be toxic great for him but i paid for a game and think its crazy to be banned for leaving a game. i paid for the game a should have the ability to leave a game when i dont enjoy the experience without a penalty of banning me from playing the game i paid for in the first place. so everyone can say what they want about people disconnecting from the game but its their right to do so without fear of penalty cuz a killer or team of survivors make you miserable with your experience. this is just my opinion and everyone may have a different opinion than me and thats perfectly fine this is just one angry bearded ginger venting.

Verdict: Thrilling fun game to play with friends or alone with strangers.
Be a cold blooded murderer and or stalker to scare others.
Or be a survivor but for how long can you survive ?

When playing games like these i often feel the pressure when you're the only one left and everybody sees what you do.
Like the new game propnight is the same idea as this game and well executed but you can hear the squeekers calling out for everything you do.

I'm glad this is not the case in this game.

A game with a brilliant concept completely marred by p2w aspects, poor onboarding, and gets harder to try and learn with each passing month. The initial price tag is a complete lie, as you can't even practice any other killers or perks without owning those characters. At this point, the game is so insular in terms of its meta and design, there really isn't much of a point in trying to learn it now, as you're never going to be able to play with people of even skill, or purchases. It's going to take a complete rebalance of the entire game to make it passable for new players

This game can have it's downs do to some toxic players, but overall I really love this game. The matches don't get repetitive because of the massive variety, the characters are diverse (I found someone who looks like me!), there are awesome and unique abilities, and there are never ending events that encourage you to play the game more. Alone the game is nice and with friends it is 10X better.  This game is great to have to play like crazy or have as an option for something casual to play on the side. High-key suggest getting it during a sale too (and it is on sale a lot) so you get your money's worth.
